name: PizzaYOLO
description:
This piece of "game" I've made haunted me for nights.

I'ts ugly, unbalanced, hard and barely playable (unless you understand the scoring rules, pizza throwing will remind you times were game design was not a big deal).

Now that I have accepted the fact that it's one of my monstruosity, I've decided to share it again. Since, I'm in peace and my dreams are anew fulfilled with pizza !

I hope you'll find your own way to enjoy it ;).

Credits : 

Hipp - Programming

Folliz - Assets

PizzAVENGERS - Pizza throwing sound

Music : I wanna be a hippy - Technohead
